Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were fabricated by applying reproducible thin, dense La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta (LSCM) anode and La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (LSM) cathode films to yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolytes by ultrasonic spray pyrolysis.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: A gold grid was applied to the anode film by lithography and plating, enabling adequate electrical contact while maintaining an open surface area for reaction.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Alignment of the two electrode films and correct placement of the reference electrode enabled the separation of the anode and cathode impedance responses.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Although the open-circuit voltage (OCV) of the LSCM vertical bar YSZ vertical bar LSM fuel cell at 700 degrees C with humidified H-2 fuel was close to that predicted by the Nernst equation, the anode polarization resistance was large (23 center dot cm(2)).
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The addition of Pd to the anode film led only to a small decrease in polarization resistance, indicating that oxygen ion conductivity was the limiting factor for H-2 fuel.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The OCV for CH4 was close to that when an inert gas (He) was supplied to the anode.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: This OCV increased to 0.87 V upon addition of Pd to the LSCM film surface.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: This indicates that the bare LSCM film is limited by a low CH4 activation activity.
Titulo: Insights Into the Fuel Oxidation Mechanism of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ SOFC Anodes
